overview: Akira and Kaho meet one fine day in a bus shelter as they both wait for their train. Mutual interest gradually turns into a somewhat cool summer romance. Soon Akira receives a call from a friend who is looking for a place to stay for a few days, which leads to an idiosyncratic dynamic emerging from the threesome, at the end of which is the question of whether the love of one's life can also emerge from a summer fling.
title: I Water a Cactus
